title: Hong Kong falls more than 3% as US-China tensions weigh on investor sentiment
description: Tensions are rising between Washington and Beijing, as U.S. President Donald Trump said Sunday that he believed that a "mistake" in China was the cause of the spreading coronavirus pandemic.

title: Coronavirus deaths slow in Italy, NRA lays off employees
description: Covid-19 has infected more than 3.4 million people around the world as of Sunday, killing at least 244,229 people.

title: Russia sees over 10,000 new coronavirus cases; Euro zone manufacturing slumps in April
description: Public health officials have said a coronavirus vaccine could take a year to 18 months.
